N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-1.13 - Boiler operator

State Regulations
(a) Every person attending a boiler shall be provided sufficient training to allow
that person sufficient knowledge to operate the boiler in a safe and efficient
manner. (b) The boiler operator
shall keep a log for each shift that he is responsible for operating the
boiler. That log shall provide the following information, which may vary
according to type of boiler: (1)
blowdown of
water column and sight glass and other safety equipment; (2)
blowdown of mud drum and
headers; (3)
record of water
treatment; (4)
test of safety
valves; (5)
record of any operating
problems or deficiencies; and
(6)
signature of boiler operator. (c) The log shall be available for inspection
by the State boiler inspector and the insurance carrier inspector. Notes
